member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Сonsiders how many years the town needs to see its population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.
member.param: the population at the beginning of a year.
number of regular increase in residents.
member.returns: How many years does the town need to see its population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.
